review.review_text: Best Tried a lot but that one is the one to go for.. thanks
Awesome My best friend can give me hella music in a few seconds
Works fine on rooted 10" SVP tablet The GUI is 101 not so polished but it works for basic transfer functionality .let's you choose dest dir,which helped.i cannot set destination dir path Uninstalled

Too simplistic I suppose the idea was a 1-click and go solution. But it's like someone's junior high programming project. Only works if EVERYTHING is just right. If it don't...no configuration setting, no helpful error messages, no manual, Pathetic in my opinion. Tired of such crap. Come back when you're willing to ... ahem ... make an EFFORT.

Excellent app!! just works
Brilliant. Absolutely brilliant! I tried 4 others before I found this one and you can do every thing without confusion. Its works brill with my chimp tablet pc
Super
No stability First time am able 2 send, but after that it is showing error
Simply beautiful I have tried many and can hardly connect to my devices this is just si simple and easy to use works brilliantly the best app i have used to transfer files from device to device.

Great app love it Brilliant app been trying to send movies by bluetooth but keeps failing and taking agers but this app is perfect sent my movie over to another device in 5 minutes
Works great! Really fast and works great!

review.review_title: Old, simple design, PC-client even older.
review.review_text: But still works for me. Why changing a working app ;-) Finding the client on that webside is not that easy. "https://sites.google.com/site/antosdrproject/file-cabinet/WifiFileTransferPC.jar?attredirects=0" And for someone who does'n know how to start the PC-Client "java -jar WifiFileTransferPC.jar" would be helpful.

I suppose the idea was a 1-click and go solution. But it's like someone's junior high programming project. Only works if EVERYTHING is just right. If it don't...no configuration setting, no helpful error messages, no manual, Pathetic in my opinion. Tired of such crap. Come back when you're willing to ... ahem ... make an EFFORT.
This app is so amazing. Works perfect between my SGS2 and Note II at very high speed with no size limit like other ones around. The best out here. Yeah.
